subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The two huge sailboats that raced in the America's Cup in 2010 cost tens of millions of dollars, and neither has sailed since, symbolizing the excesses of the event.
snippet: The two huge sailboats that raced in the America's Cup in 2010 cost tens of millions of dollars, and neither has sailed since, symbolizing the excesses of the event.
